outputs.output_descr: The project aims to achieve a strengthened legislative, oversight and representational role of the National Assembly and National Council of Bhutan to build and sustain democracy and development with the full participation of the people of Bhutan. This will be conducted through support to the committee system, secretariat, parliamentarians and outreach functions, within the framework of a strategic plan.

project_descr: Developing the legislative, oversight and representational roles of the Parliament of Bhutan
